titles.title: Calling for the immediate and unconditional release of the three kidnapped teenagers held captive in the West Bank, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
6/25/2014--Introduced. Demands the release of the three captives, Eyal Yifrach, Gil-ad Sha'er and Naftali Frankel.
Expresses: (1) support for Israel as a Jewish and democratic state, with secure borders, living in peace alongside an independent Palestinian state; (2) concern and sympathy for the families of Eyal Yifrach, Gil-ad Sha'er, and Naftali Frankel; and (3) a commitment to seek the captives' release.
Reiterates the commitment of the House of Representatives to uphold the conditions in U.S. law regarding U.S. assistance to the Palestinian Authority (PA).
